price: Kuma Allah bai kasance Yanã yi musu azãba ba alhãli kuwa kai kanã cikinsu,* kuma Allah bai kasance Mai yi musu azãba ba alhãli kuwa sunã yin istigfãri.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَأَنتَ فِيهِمۡۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ
footnotes: * Rãyuwar Annabi a cikin mutãne aminci ne daga azãba, haka kuma yin istigfãri aminci ne. Wanda ke son wadãta da aminci daga Allah, sai ya lazimci istigfãri da bin sunnar Annabi, tsĩra da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna al-lahu liyuʿadhibahum wa-anta fīhim wamā kāna al-lahu muʿadhibahum wahum yastaghfirūna
